vsParam:
That's all. If you have any problem in the Academy,
feel free to ask me or the Student Union.

Thank you! I am a little anxious since I just arrived,
I can rest assured now!

Ah, right. What's with the bulletin board over there?
I saw many strange papers posted on it...

Uh. That's the bulletin board where commissions
are posted. It is an important part in the Academy life...

Uh, Hazel.
What are you doing?

Oh, you guys.
You came just in time.
*Boo-hoo*, how come I have a bad feeling...

... Let me think. Compared to oral explanation, it's
better to show you. Let's invite [px] to show you how
to complete the commission over there.
Uh——!? T, this is too abrupt!?

Relax. I chose an easy commission for you.
I am sure you can manage it, right?

Alright, just show the foreign student how to
use the bulletin board, now.

*Sob*, *Sob sob*, there's nothing we can do...
Just do what she said, [px]!

Phew, phew... Commission completed!
I am done here, Hazel!

As you can see, you just need to complete the
commissions posted on the bulletin board like that.

The important thing is to choose a suitable
commission. Don't take risks.

H, how can you say that...
Asking us to do this and that...

Uh, I thought I picked a suitable
commission for your guys, no?

You still got strength to complain,
looks like the commission I picked was too easy.

This time I'll give you a tougher commission...
Let me see, this one seems good.

"What happens if your commission fails"... We better
demonstrate this case too, what do you think?

Oh no... Monster, monster here!
Fall back, fall back!!

It's just kidding.
Ho ho ho, they really are interesting.
